body: Add note when building on WS2012R2

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Please, include the link to a bug in dotnet cli https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/1543

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: Create a new pull request: #600 , thanks.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @JumpingYang001 For future reference, it's totally okay to just force push amended or rebased commits to your feature branch, the PR will automatically update so you don't have to open a new one.

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: @andschwa thanks for this, I am a GitHub new guy.:D

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @JumpingYang001 No problem, I love GitHub :octocat: feel free to ping me if you have any questions.
